name: Planet Tinder
description:
It is the year 2155. The Earth is in ruins. In a final desperate act, humanity is bundled into colony ships and launched towards the stars.

You are the captain of one of those ships. Like most humans, you were never much of an "academic" so luckily the ship is outfitted with a cutting edge user experience honed over 10000s of focus group hours...

God save us all!
